entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
